Package engine.move

Class Move

java.lang.Object
engine.move.Move
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Move extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a move from one tile to another with an optional flat to represent special moves. This class implements the Serializable interface to allow deep-copying by the BoardInfo class.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Move

      public Move(Coordinate startTile, Coordinate endTile)
      Constructs a Move object between two tiles.
      Parameters:
      startTile - the origin of the piece being moved.
      endTile - the destination of the piece being moved.
      See Also:
      • Move(engine.util.Coordinate,engine.util.Coordinate,engine.move.Move.Flag)

    • Move

      public Move(Coordinate startTile, Coordinate endTile, Move.Flag flag)
      Constructs a Move object between two tiles.
      Parameters:
      startTile - the origin of the piece being moved.
      endTile - the destination of the piece being moved.
      flag - the special flag for this move.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if startTile or endTile is null.
      NullPointerException - if flag is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if startTile or endTile is invalid.

    • isPromotion

      public boolean isPromotion()
      Determines if this move resulted in the promotion of a piece. Promotion is defined if getFlag().equals(Move.Flag.PROMOTE_*)
      Returns:
      true if this move resulted in the promotion of a piece.

    • isEnPassant

      public boolean isEnPassant()
      Determines if this move is an en passant move. Equivalent to getMove().equals(Move.Flag.EN_PASSANT).
      Returns:
      true if this move is an en passant move.

    • isPawnTwoForward

      public boolean isPawnTwoForward()
      Determines if this move resulted in a pawn moving two tiles forward. Equivalent to getMove().equals(Move.Flag.PAWN_TWO_FORWARD).
      Returns:
      true if this move resulted in a pawn moving two tiles forward.

    • isCastleKingside

      public boolean isCastleKingside()
      Determines if this move resulted in kingside castling. Equivalent to getMove().equals(Move.Flag.CASTLE_KINGSIDE).
      Returns:
      true if this move resulted in kingside castling.

    • isCastleQueenside

      public boolean isCastleQueenside()
      Determines if this move resulted in queenside castling. Equivalent to getMove().equals(Move.Flag.CASTLE_QUEENSIDE).
      Returns:
      true if this move resulted in queenside castling.

    • inferFlag

      public static Move.Flag inferFlag(Piece piece, Coordinate startTile, Coordinate endTile, Coordinate enPassantTile)
      Determines the flag that should be assigned to a move.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece being moved.
      startTile - the tile the piece started on.
      endTile - the tile the piece ended on.
      enPassantTile - the en passant tile if one is available, null otherwise.
      Returns:
      a Move.Flag enumerator type.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is other than enPassantTile.
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the Coordinate arguments are invalid.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks for equality between this Move object and another object. Equality is determined by:
      • Equal start tiles
      • Equal end tiles
      • Equal flags

      Equality of the components of the Move object are determined by the equals methods of the components.

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare equality.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this Move object. The string is composed of:
      • The start tile coordinate toString.
      • An arrow "->" between the moves.
      • The end tile coordinate toString.
      • The flag of the move.

      An example of a move from A1 to B1 would be:

      a1b1 (NONE)

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of this Move object.
